# cachePolicy

**Instance Property**

The request’s cache policy.

## Declaration

```swift
var cachePolicy: NSURLRequest.CachePolicy { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is ignored for requests used to construct [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionUploadTask] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionDownloadTask] objects, as caching is not supported by the URL Loading System for upload or download requests.

## Working with a cache policy

- **NSURLRequest.CachePolicy**: The constants used to specify interaction with the cached responses.
